description:
This modern masterpiece promises the very best in inner-city living with easy links to South Bank, West End and the bustling Brisbane CBD. Designed by the renowned architectural team at Rothelowman, this spectacular abode is simply stunning with flawless finishes and fixtures on show throughout.

Tall floor-to-ceiling windows draw in natural light and frame the awe-inspiring river and city views plus there's also a covered balcony for hosting guests. The living space is open and inviting with a lounge and dining area along with a well-equipped kitchen ready for the eager cook.

Timber-plank flooring, ducted air-conditioning and high ceilings enhance the contemporary appeal and ensure this is a home that will delight even the most discerning buyer. There's one bedroom and one bathroom along with a single parking space for convenience.

All this is set within a prestigious building with a rooftop terrace, an infinity pool, a BBQ area, a lounge and more. Shops, cafes and restaurants are at your fingertips and you're also close to riverside parklands, public transport links, QPAC and the TAFE campus.

- Architecturally designed, luxurious and modern inner-city apartment
- One bedroom and one bathroom with spectacular river and city views
- Open-plan kitchen, lounge and dining area leading to the covered balcony
- Dream kitchen with European appliances, a gas stove and stone benchtops
- An extra-large wardrobe and a sleek ensuite for the lucky new owners
- Ducted air-conditioning, timber-plank floors and a single parking space
- A shared rooftop terrace, an infinity pool, a lounge, dining and BBQ area
- Walk to cafes, restaurants, shops, bars and handy public transport links
- Close to QPAC, the Queensland Museum, Brisbane State High, TAFE and more

Disclaimer
